element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm creates a Voronoi tesselation from a set of input points. Each of this points represents a so-called Voronoi site
The resulting Voronoi tesellation contains one polygon for each site. The polygon associated to a given site contains all the points closer to that site than to any other site. The segments of the Voronoi diagram are all the points in the plane that are equidistant to the two nearest sites. The Voronoi nodes are the points equidistant to three (or more) sites.

element.name: TRIANGLES
element.text: The Voronoi tesellation. Attributes from each input point are transfered to its associated Voronoi polygon.
